name: Commando (itch)
description:
Soldat meets Battlefield - side-view multiplayer shooter with procedural maps.

In constant development. Upcoming features:  more weapons, classes, better netcode and performance,  more game modes, vehicles. Standalone version - soon. Be sure to follow!

Join my Discord! https://discord.gg/T8ejr5u
Follow me on Twitter https://twitter.com/soldatmm 

 Controls: 
WASD + Mouse
R - reload
E - hold for grenades
Q - change weapon
Tab - scores
T - chat
~ - console
\addbot
\rembot
for adding or removing bots

Be friendly and have fun!
MM
